abstract: Two bloggers chat on the state of the world, and prospects for a smooth ride in the 21st century.
snippet: Two bloggers chat on the state of the world, and prospects for a smooth ride in the 21st century.
lead_paragraph: 9:54 p.m. | Updated I just had a fun Bloggingheads.tv discussion with David Roberts of Grist about the nature of the changes under way on the planet, prospects for a smooth century and the ugly interface of politics and science. The conversation begins with my post expanding on Tom Friedman's column about the Wall Street protests and broader social turbulence and moves in a few related directions.

headline.main: A Chat on Turmoil and Transitions, Politics and Climate
